pattern.title: Validate METS element structmap.

rule.assert: Each METS file must include ONE structural map (structMap) element used exactly as described here. Institutions can add their own additional custom structural maps as separate structMap sections.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element type

rule.assert: The type attribute of the structural map (structMap) is set to value "PHYSICAL" from the vocabualry.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element label

rule.assert: The label attribute is set to value "CSIP StructMap" from the vocabulary.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element id

rule.assert: An identifier for the structural description (structMap) used for referencing inside the package. It must be unique within the package. The ID must follow the rules for xml:id described in the chapter of the textual description of CSIP named "General requirements for the use of metadata"

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div.

rule.assert: The structural map consist of one main division.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div id

rule.assert: Mandatory, identifier must be unique within the package. The ID must follow the rules for xml:id described in the chapter of the textual description of CSIP named "General requirements for the use of metadata".

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div label

rule.assert: The main division (div) element in the package uses the package ID as the value for the attribute LABEL.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div label sub

rule.assert: Each catagorization "Documentation", "Schemas" as well as each "Representation" within the package must be represented by an occurrence of the division (div) element. Metadata in the administrative and descriptive metadata section has its own division.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div

rule.assert: The metadata referenced in the administrative and/or descriptive metadata section is described in the structural map with one sub division When the transfer consist of only administrative and/or descriptive metadata this is the only sub division that occurs.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div id

rule.assert: Mandatory, identifier must be unique within the package. The ID must follow the rules for xml:id described in the chapter of the textual description of CSIP named "General requirements for the use of metadata".

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div label

rule.assert: The metadata division (div) element in the package uses the value "Metadata" as the value for the attribute LABEL.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div admid

rule.assert: All administrative metadata described in the package are referenced via the administrative sections different identifiers.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div dmdid

rule.assert: All descriptive metadata described in the package are referenced via the descriptive section identifiers.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div documentation

rule.assert: The documentation referenced in the file section file groups is described in the structural map with one sub division.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div documentation id

rule.assert: Mandatory, identifier must be unique within the package. The ID must follow the rules for xml:id described in the chapter of the textual description of CSIP named "General requirements for the use of metadata".

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div documentation label

rule.assert: The documentation division (div) element in the package uses the value "Documentation" as the value for the attribute LABEL.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div documentation contentid

rule.assert: All file groups containg documentation described in the package are referenced via the relevant file group identifiers.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div schema

rule.assert: The schemas referenced in the file section file groups is described in the structural map with one sub division.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div documentation id

rule.assert: Mandatory, identifier must be unique within the package. The ID must follow the rules for xml:id described in the chapter of the textual description of CSIP named "General requirements for the use of metadata".

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div schema label

rule.assert: The schema division (div) element in the package uses the value "Schemas" as the value for the attribute LABEL.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div schema contentid

rule.assert: All file groups containg schemas described in the package are referenced via the relevant file group identifiers.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div file

rule.assert: When the transfer consist of only data and no representations there are one representation div present. The transfered files referenced in the file section file group is described in the structural map with one sub division.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div file id

rule.assert: Mandatory, identifier must be unique within the package. The ID must follow the rules for xml:id described in the chapter of the textual description of CSIP named "General requirements for the use of metadata".

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div file label

rule.assert: The file division (div) element in the package uses the value "Representations" as the value for the attribute LABEL.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div file contentid

rule.assert: The file group containing the files described in the package are referenced via the relevant file group identifier.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div representation

rule.assert: The documentation referenced in the file section file groups is described in the structural map with one sub division.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div representation id

rule.assert: Mandatory, identifier must be unique within the package. The ID must follow the rules for xml:id described in the chapter of the textual description of CSIP named "General requirements for the use of metadata".

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div representation label

rule.assert: The representation division (div) element in the package uses the path to the METS document as the value for the attribute LABEL.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div representation contentid

rule.assert: The file group containing the files described in the package are referenced via the relevant file group identifier.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div mptr

rule.assert: The division (div) of the specific representation includes one occurrence of the METS pointer (mptr) element, pointing to the appropriate representation METS file.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div mptr href

rule.assert: The actual location of the resource. We recommend recording a URL type filepath within this attribute.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div mptr type

rule.assert: Attribute used with the value “simple”. Value list is maintained by the xlink standard.

pattern.title: Validate METS structmap element div div mptr loctype

rule.assert: The locator type is always used with the value "URL" from the vocabulary in the attribute.
